org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure

Class LocalCoauthorsGraph

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.dblp.mmdb.datastructure.LocalCoauthorsGraph

  • public class LocalCoauthorsGraph
extends java.lang.Object
    A class representing the 1-hop coauthor neighborhood of a given reference person. The nodes of the neighborhood are clustered into connected components according to their coauthor relation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected AbstractCoauthorGraph dblp
      The dblp coauthor graph.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      LocalCoauthorsGraph(AbstractCoauthorGraph dblp, Person center)
      Creates the local coauthor graph of the 1-hop neighborhood for the given reference center.

      • getIndex

        public int getIndex(Person person)
        Retrieve the community index of the given coauthor.
        Parameters:
        person - The coauthors to look up.
        Returns:
        index The community index between 0 and getNumberOfCommunities()), or -1 if no such coauthor exists.

      • numberOfCommunities

        public int numberOfCommunities()
        Return the number of coauthor communities in this local coauthor graph.
        Returns:
        The number of communities.

      • getEntropy

        public double getEntropy()
        Get the entropy score induced to the central person by its local coauthor graph. This value is the relative Shannon entropy H of the distribution induced by the coauthor clustering. That is, for k clusters of sizes n1,...,nk and N = n1 + ... + nk we have 
        H = ( n1/N * log(N/n1) + ... + nk/N * log(N/nk) ) / log(k)
        Returns:
        The entropy score.
        See Also:
        Entropy @ Wikipedia
